solution_line_template: Jess needs to walk {blocks_to_store} blocks + {blocks_to_gallery} blocks + {blocks_to_work} blocks = <<{blocks_to_store}+{blocks_to_gallery}+{blocks_to_work}={total_blocks_needed}>>{total_blocks_needed} blocks total.
Jess needs to go {total_blocks_needed} blocks – {blocks_already_walked} = <<{total_blocks_needed}-{blocks_already_walked}={remaining_blocks}>>{remaining_blocks} blocks to get to work.
